english.segment1: Who could imagine a melody. True enough to tell of Your mercy?. Who could imagine a harmony. Sweet enough to tell of Your love?. I see the heavens proclaiming day after day, And I know in my heart that there must be a way
english.segment2: To sing a greater song, A greater song to You on the earth. To sing a greater song, A greater song to You on the earth.
english.segment3: Who could imagine a symphony, Grand enough to tell of Your glory?. Our highest praise but a feeble breath. A whisper of Your thunderous worth.
english.segment4: I see the heavens proclaiming day after day, And I know in my heart that there must be a way
english.segment5: To sing a greater song, A greater song to You on the earth. To sing a greater song, A greater song to You on the earth.
english.segment6: Hallelujah, we want to lift You higher, Hallelujah, we want to lift You higher.
english.segment7: I see the heavens proclaiming day after day, And I know in my heart that there must be a way
english.segment8: Hallelujah, we want to lift You higher, Hallelujah, we want to lift You higher.
